content: {"locationId": "13587", "organizationId": "10695", "name": "NEIGHBORS NOURISHING NEIGHBORS", "address1": "474 N HAYS RD", "address2": "Ste E1", "city": "PROSPER", "state": "TX", "zipCode": "75078", "country": null, "phone": "469-296-8877", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://N3FOODPANTRY.ORG", "latitude": "33.24036", "longitude": "-96.78409", "foodPrograms": "Shelter", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Collin, Dallas, Delta, Ellis, Fannin, Grayson, Hopkins, Hunt, Kaufman, Lamar, Navarro, Rockwall", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Neighbors Nourishing Neighbors Food Pantry is dedicated to eradicating hunger within our community in Prosper, Texas. Our mission is to assist those in need by providing essential food supplies, emphasizing the importance of nutrition while fostering independence and hope. We are proud to be a largely volunteer-driven organization, uniting the community through service and ensuring that no neighbor goes hungry.    Our Impact    Community Support: Approximately 50% of our food resources come from local donations, including churches, businesses, and individuals, making every contribution significantly impactful.  Client Base: We serve primarily young families, Hispanic households, and seniors who struggle to secure enough healthy food, reaching about 3,000 individuals each month.  Services: Beyond food, we also provide household items and toiletries, serving as a primary source of support for many families.   Our Values   Respect: We value every individual and family we serve, treating them with dignity and respect.  Community: We believe in the power of community service and collaboration to address hunger and promote well-being.  Resilience: Despite challenges, such as the recent fire that affected our operations, we remain committed to our mission and are working tirelessly to restore our services.   Join Us    We invite you to join us in our mission to nourish our neighbors and build a stronger, more compassionate community. Your support, whether through donations or volunteering, is crucial in helping us continue providing vital resources to those in need.", "notes": "Please check our website or facebook page for distribution details.
